Reviews.Title: “Disappointed traveler”
Reviews.Author: DFlover
Reviews.Content: past stayed hotel cuba times usually weeks time trips happy hotel trips bad experiences april forced move night inconvience unpacked settled 3 weeks apparently management family choice trip worse reservations weeks advance requested prefer recieved email saying reservation confirmed arrived told available double bed requested king size bed inside poor ventilation am sorry management apparently value repeat customers

Reviews.Title: “As cheap as good hotels get in DF”
Reviews.Author: nasaguy26
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel cuba noisy nights hotel republica street 250 clean hardwood floors tv pretty nice bathroom dont theyve changed prices stayed american friends nicer hotels 100night found par hotel cuba noise hallways amplify noise random announcements employees throughout day annoying worth price

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy!!!”

Reviews.Content: visit mexico df spent night hotels disappoint lot looks fine visit surprised choose street dont sleep noise street choose insight stay awake guest shutdown tv midnight awake 5 oclock coming theese guests didnt mind noise interior garage hotel stay 2 weeks ran night hot water event times supply hangers safe deposit service
